official_title: A bill to provide medicare benefits with respect to services furnished to medicare beneficiaries who require enterally or parenterally administered chemically defined elemental formula diets.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide coverage under the Medicare program for services and supplies furnished in connection with enterally or parenterally administered chemically defined elemental formula diets.

titles.title: A bill to provide medicare benefits with respect to services furnished to medicare beneficiaries who require enterally or parenterally administered chemically defined elemental formula diets.
